column2: Acceptance Criteria - Verify binder being used matches that specified on the job pack
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off & Delivery Docket
Frequency - Delivery Docket & Maximum lot size 350t of same class and size
Acceptance Criteria - VicRoads Standard Specification Sections:
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off & Delivery Docket
Frequency - All works carried out & Delivery Docket upon request
Acceptance Criteria - Distillate based product, cutback bitumen, emulsion based product or proprietary product.
• Supply plant pre-coated aggregate from supplier or field pre-coated aggregate from stack site
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off & Delivery Docket
Acceptance Criteria - The Contractor shall determine the rates of application in accordance with the procedures set out in the Guide to Pavement Technology: Part 4K.
• Rates shall be expressed in L/m2 and residual binder at 15°C.
• At least 1 week prior, rates of application, aggregate and rates for pre-treatment to be reviewed by Superintendent.
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off & Rate of Application for Residual Binder at 15°C
Acceptance Criteria - Calibration Certificate to be provided
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off & Compliance Certificate

Acceptance Criteria - Prior to the works being carried out, the Contractor shall provide written confirmation of the works that will be undertaken the following day and obtain agreement from the Superintendent to any variation in the rates of application to those provided under Cl. 408.13(a)
• Works shall not commence until the Contractor & Superintendent have agreed that the road or pavement surface is fit & ready for surfacing no more than 24 hours prior to the works occurring
• DSG Specification Section 310 – Preparation of Granular Pavement for Bituminous Surfacing shall be satisfied for initial seals
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum Temperature to meet criteria as set out in Table 408.131
Treatment Type || Min. air & pavement Temp. (°C)
C170 and crumb rubber modified PMBs || 15
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off & Temperature Check
Inspection / Test Method - Dip sprayer after each run
Inspection / Test Method - Measure spread of aggregate
>5000 and all Freeways || Within 8 hours of sealing
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria - Job completion report (Spray Sheets) to be submitted within seven days of completion of sealing works.
Acceptance Criteria - Actual vs design rates. Variation between actual & design assessed by Table 408.131
Acceptance Criteria - Acceptance - visual assessment or (where required) as per Table 408.152
Conformance Record - This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria - Acceptance - visual assessment or (where required) as per Table 408.153

Acceptance Criteria - Provide a surface with uniform colour, texture and consistent appearance
